name: WILLS EYE HOSPITAL and Phico Insurance Company, Appellants, v. WORKERS COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Henry DeWaele, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Wills Eye Hospital v. Workers Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and GAPPY, JJ.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
parties: WILLS EYE HOSPITAL and Phico Insurance Company, Appellants, v. WORKERS COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Henry DeWaele, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robin Ball, Thomas J. Magrann, Secty., W.C.A.B., for DeWaele.
casebody.head_matter:
582 A.2d 857
WILLS EYE HOSPITAL and Phico Insurance Company, Appellants, v. WORKERS COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Henry DeWaele, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 3, 1990.
Decided Oct. 19, 1990.
Patrice Toland, for appellants.
Larry Pitt, for appellees.
Robin Ball, Thomas J. Magrann, Secty., W.C.A.B., for DeWaele.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and GAPPY, JJ.
